definition: that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to disrespect one's superiors/to offend one's elders

sentences.english: Here, the Asia Water Project summarises the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 以下是亚洲水资源项目对该论题的概述。

sentences.english: Here is a list of what it will include.
sentences.chinese: 以下是它所能够包含的新特性列表。

sentences.english: Here are the three steps of drawing a sketch map of Siu Sai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 以下是绘画小西湾略图的三个步骤。

sentences.english: Fat A triglyceride of a long-chain carboxylic acid that is solid below 20℃.
sentences.chinese: 一种长链羧酸的甘油三酯，20℃以下为固态。

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 将近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平处于贫困线以下。

sentences.english: As the temperature is below zero, the water pipe ruptured with the cold.
sentences.chinese: 气温已降到零度以下，水管冻裂了。

sentences.english: Here are some things to consider so that your days are loaded with accomplishments.
sentences.chinese: 为了你的每一天都饱有成就，你需要考虑的以下几点。

sentences.english: The following items are examples of the benefits operators have achieved by using the component removal reduction (CRR) process.
sentences.chinese: 以下内容是使用CRR程序后受益航空公司的实例。

sentences.english: And 73 percent of them are frontline jobs, in city-level units or below.
sentences.chinese: 其中73%是市级或以下机关的基层职位。

sentences.english: Neither do you want to enable these options, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 我猜，你也不想要以下这些选项吧。

sentences.english: B. Pick out the proper nouns in the following sentences.
sentences.chinese: 试选出以下句子中的专有名词。

sentences.english: The dog's height should not exceed 40 cm, weight 10 kg.
sentences.chinese: 狗的身高不能超过40厘米，体重在10公斤以下。

sentences.english: Follow these steps to map subunits to existing models and packages.
sentences.chinese: 按照以下的步骤来将子单元映射为已存在的模型和包。

sentences.english: Many techie toys are wallet-friendly at under $30.
sentences.chinese: 许多技术人员的玩具钱包友好在30美元以下。

sentences.english: Above and below the lions and bulls were wreaths of hammered work.
sentences.chinese: 边上有小座，狮子和牛以下有垂下的璎珞。

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 请问阁下是否有兴趣优先登记以下展览会？

definition: that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
one of the given (options etc)/the first/firstly
